metadata.dc:author: de Posada, Francisco González
metadata.dc:description: Leonardo Torres Quevedo's contribution to "the conquest of the air", to which humanity devoted so much effort in the early twentieth century is describe and his original inventions on dirigibles -the "Torres Quevedo", the "Astra-Torres" and the "Coastal"- and cable cars - Monte Ulía (San Sebastián) y Spanish Aerocar (Niágara, Canáda) are emphasised.
metadata.dc:title: Leonardo Torres Quevedo: el más prodigioso inventor de su tiempo.
[Leonardo Torres Quevedo: the most prodigious inventor of his time].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
